price: If they could find a refuge, caves, or a place to hide, they would rush headlong to it[52].
arabic: لَوۡ يَجِدُونَ مَلۡجَـًٔا أَوۡ مَغَٰرَٰتٍ أَوۡ مُدَّخَلٗا لَّوَلَّوۡاْ إِلَيۡهِ وَهُمۡ يَجۡمَحُونَ
footnotes: [52] A vividly depiction of their life of constant distress and anguish.
